name: 伊莱贾·墨菲
birth_place: 美国,加利福尼亚州,洛杉矶
introduction: Born in Los Angeles, California in 1960, joined the Army after graduating from McDonald County High School, Anderson, Missouri. Served first in the U.S. Army Infantry, joined the Army Special Forces in 1982 and served throughout Europe and the Middle East. Lived in Germany for 10 years. Acquired improvisational role playing skills as part of numerous military exercises and training events.
